{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = 750Mbps Wireless-N Beam-forming IPv6 Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.airlive.com/product/n450r |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = OvisLink |model = N450R |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = ODMN450R, PBLCDW68AAMU01 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT3883; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 500 MHz -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = PieceMakers;PME809416BBR-E7DN; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:4F:67 |oui = 00:4F:67
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, (57600 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.254 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = airlive |defaultssid = airlive2.4, airlive5g |defaultssid_regex = ^airlive2.4$,,,^airlive5g$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = AMIT |manuf_model = CDW68AAM-U01 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/07/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Ralink;RT5392; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "11340Y20IU00003B1" and "2011/08/09" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
[http://openrouter.info/forum/viewtopic.php?p=17951 On openrouter.info], post by ''obsy'' :16MB Flash, 64MB RAM :Serial pinout: (Pin 1) <-- VCC, RX, TX, GND
This device appears to be a [[AMIT CDW68AAM-U01]]. The FCC ID of the parent OEM product (PBLCDW68AAMU01) has been assigned to this entry.
The default SSIDs for this device appear to be '''airlive2.4''' (or perhaps '''airlive2.4g''') and '''airlive5g'''. There are two entries for the 2.4GHz SSID on WiGLE.. and one for the 5GHz SSID. 00:4F:67 is presumed to be the OUI used.
==Links of Interest== [http://fs.airlive.com/manual/AirLive_N450R_Manual.pdf Manual]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
